yuda aparadha chodana gana kiyaminaarakshaka lekamamal yashoman jayasinhayuda aparadha chodana sambandhayen shri lankawa labadun sadhaniya pilithuruwalin sahimakata path nowana atham wides balawega uthsaha daramin sitinne thamanata awanatha durwala rajayak shri lankawe athikara ganimata yayi aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha sandahan karayi.ee mahatha me bawa pawasuye jathika sanwidhana ekamuthuwa sanwidhanaya kala “yuda aparadha kumanthranaya paradawamu” yana mayen pawathi sammanthranayaka diya.thrasthawadaya parajaya kirime satanedi siyaluma dena ekata ekwi katayuthuª kala men shri lankawata erehi dushta balawega parajaya kirimata bheda nothaka ekamuthu wiya yuthuwa athi bawath hethema kiya.
